Protocols/TypedNotificationCenter.html#/.name: addObserver(forType:object:queue:using:)
Protocols/TypedNotificationCenter.html#/.abstract: Registers a block to be executed when a matching notification is posted.

Protocols/TypedNotification.html#/s:17Ty.name: Object
Protocols/TypedNotification.html#/s:17Ty.abstract: The type of an object attached to the notification.

Protocols/TypedNotification.html#/s:17Ty.name: name
Protocols/TypedNotification.html#/s:17Ty.abstract: The name of the notification that identifies it.

Protocols/TypedNotification.html.name: TypedNotification
Protocols/TypedNotification.html.abstract: A notification that can be posted by a TypedNotificationCenter instance.

Protocols/TypedNotificationCenter.html.name: TypedNotificationCenter
Protocols/TypedNotificationCenter.html.abstract: A type that can post TypedNotifications and add notification observers.

Extensions/NotificationCenter.html#/s:So.name: addObserver(forNotificationNamed:object:queue:using:)
Extensions/NotificationCenter.html#/s:So.abstract: Registers a block to be executed when a matching un-typed notification is posted.

Classes/NotificationObservation.html#/s:.name: init(_:)
Classes/NotificationObservation.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes a new observation that runs a provided block when it is deallocated.

Classes/NotificationObservation.html#/s:.name: stored(in:)
Classes/NotificationObservation.html#/s:.abstract: Adds the observation to a given observation bag.

Classes/NotificationObservation.html.name: NotificationObservation
Classes/NotificationObservation.html.abstract: An opaque reference type that manages the lifetime of a notification observer.

Classes/NotificationObservationBag.html.name: NotificationObservationBag
